lead_paragraph: The bankrupt Trump Taj Mahal casino received court approval on Friday to break its labor agreement, a key condition for a rescue deal with billionaire Carl Icahn, and the union promptly announced a plan to picket the Atlantic City, New Jersey hotel.

headline.main: Trump Atlantic City Casino Gets Court OK to Break Labor Deal
headline.print_headline: Trump Atlantic City Casino Gets Court OK to Break Labor Deal
